Posts.Content: Jul 10, 2013 12:29AM Michelle69 wrote: Hello ladies, New to this in terms of posting but on it since diagnosis back in may 2013. I start my chemo A/c treatment this Thursday and it finally hit me that this is real and is happening to ME and no I am not going to wake up from a bad dream. I am so scared behind belief so i can use any help/advice i can get from you all. I know together we will get through this, maybe it doesnt seem too doable at this time but i know the more we know the more prepared we are to fight this beast.  Waiting to hear from you .... Diagnosed 5/2013 DIC 11positive lymph nodes out of 17, tumor 2cm, stage III breast cancer, Her2+ ER PR+ lumpectomy 6/2013
Posts.Title: Starting Chemo July 2013 Mellie289 JeriGrace
